actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the War Powers Resolution to make clear the President must consult with and otherwise seek the advice and guidance of both the leadership and the appropriate committees of the Congress before introducing U.S. Armed Forces into hostilities.

summary.text: Clarifies the requirement that the President must consult with and otherwise seek the advice and guidance of both the leadership and the appropriate committees of Congress before introducing United States Armed Forces into hostilities under the War Powers Resolution.

titles.title: A bill to amend the War Powers Resolution to make clear the President must consult with and otherwise seek the advice and guidance of both the leadership and the appropriate committees of the Congress before introducing U.S. Armed Forces into hostilities.
